import { useState } from "react"; import {toast} from 'react-toastify'; function AdmissionForm() { const [image,setImage]= useState(""); const [photourl,setPhotoUrl]=useState(""); const [name,setName]=useState(""); const [fatherName,setFatherName]=useState(""); const [motherName,setMotherName]=useState(""); const [gender,setGender]=useState(""); const [addres,setaddress]=useState(""); const [mobileNumber,setMobileNumber]=useState(""); const [dob,setDob]=useState([]); const [course,setCourse]=useState("") const postForm =()=>{ fetch('http://localhost:3000/studentRegistration',{ method:'post', body:{ } }) } const uploadPhoto = () => { const data = new FormData() data.append("file", image) data.append("upload_preset", "hridesh_Bharati") data.append("cloud_name","WebDeveloper") fetch('https://api.cloudinary.com/v1_1/WebDeveloper/image/upload',{ method:'post', body: data }).then(res=> res.json()) .then(data=> {setPhoto(data.url) postForm() }) .catch((error)=>{ console.log(error) }) return (
